name: Dr. Belmont vs. The Disease (Demo)
description:
Probably the first game created with Figma (as far as I can tell). For best results:


  • A powerful computer is recommended. I have a 1070 video card in my machine (which is a few years out of date) and it runs fine in Firefox/Chrome (though I have noticed a little bit of bugginess on Chrome)
  • Full screen is recommended
  • Mobile devices are probably not going to do well with how much smart animation is going on- wouldn't recommend it unless that's all you have.


If you'd like to know how I made this, I wrote a 'making of' post on reddit (because if you're like me, you're probably curious about how stuff got made). Feel free to join the subreddit and share any derivatives you made from this file!


If you'd like to chat in person, I created a discord server for the game.


If you'd like, you can follow me on my intermittantly active Twitter.


If you're looking to fund a game created by me, feel free to reach out on reddit or discord.


Thanks for playing!


Dan
